SELECT COUNT(A.HIBBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND A.HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, HIBBS_PARENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, HIBBS_PARENT FROM ( SELECT A.HIBBS_SEQ AS HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.HIBBS_PARENT, 0) AS HIBBS_PARENT FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND A.HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue})>0
ORDER BY A.HIBBS_GROUP DESC, A.HIBBS_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT A.HIBBS_SEQ AS HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS HIBBS_READ_CNT, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.HIBBS_PARENT, 0) AS HIBBS_PARENT FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.HIBBS_SEQ = ${value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, NVL(FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(FILE_EXT, '') AS FILE_EXT, NVL(FILE_SIZE, 0) AS FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM TBL_HIBOARD_FILE WHERE HIBBS_SEQ = #{value} AND FILE_SEQ = 1
